attributes.long-description:
Developed by Tarsier Studios, Rag Doll Kung Fu™: Fists of Plastic is a PS3™ system exclusive party-fighting game with an imaginative look and feel. Rag Doll Kung Fu™ focuses on fun with exaggerated physics action and charming HD visuals. Featuring accessible and intuitive controls, the customizable rag doll characters bend, stretch, and snap to perform every move with hilarious results. Success depends on mastering basic kung fu moves while using acrobatic skills to swing off platforms and somersault through the air.

Key Features:
• Kung Fu Fun – Control hilarious puppet fighters to duke it out against the computer or friends
• Easily Accessible Controls – Simple commands plus SIXAXIS™ wireless controller motion-controls
• Character Customization – Create and customize your own fighter
• Multiplayer Mayhem – Offline multiplayer for 2-4 players
• Online Rankings and Trophy Support – Supports online leaderboards and Trophies

Rag Doll Kung Fu™ Fists of Plastic ©2008 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Tarsier Studios AB. "Rag Doll Kung Fu" is a trademark of Mark Healey.

Use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
